sentence.Network_en: When Eleanor returned, I was still sitting glumly on the settee.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃莉诺回来的时候，我还闷闷不乐地坐在长沙发上。

sentence.Network_en: We sat primly at either end of a long settee.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们非常拘谨地坐在长椅的两头。

sentence.Network_en: She was lying on a small settee in the parlor.
sentence.Network_cn: 她躺在客厅的一张小长椅上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... seminal a 繁殖的；开创性的 settee n 长靠椅（人安定休息的地方） severe a 严肃的；严厉的.
雅思口语常用词汇 - 雅思口语 ... couch 长沙发 settee 中小型沙发 divan 木制软垫长椅.
家具销售实用英语 - 豆丁网 ... expedite, 迅速的畅通的 settee 有靠背的长椅 stool： 凳子.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... setscrew 固定螺丝钉 settee 长椅 setter 安装员.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: perhaps a fanciful variant of settle

entry.tran: (可供两人以上坐的、有靠背及扶手的)长沙发，长靠椅
entry.def: A settee is a long comfortable seat with a back and arms, which two or more people can sit on.

means.word_mean: 1. a long wooden bench with a back

auth_sentence.content: She was in her father's arms on the settee.

auth_sentence.content: "I just think back to when I was lying on my settee with my leg up in the air with a red and blue cast on," Williams said.

sentences.en: Come and sit next to me on the settee.
sentences.cn: 过来跟我一块儿坐在沙发上。
